alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 27 at 11:55AM CDT until March 27 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HARRISON AND SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 1155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Latimer, or over St. Martin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Moss Point, St. Martin, Gautier, D`iberville, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Hickory Hills and Gulf Park Estates. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 43 and 66. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
